page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In our area there is not much local employment.There are shops,workshops, a pottery,surgeries,schools,a Tramway Museum,a quarry,garages and farmwork. Most people have to go into towns or nearby factories for work.We did a survey of children to see where their parents worked.Here are the results:_} In the village {24.}Do not work {27 Stevensons Dye Works (2 miles away){9 Lea Mills ( 3 miles away ) {2 Workers in other towns _ Belper {8 }Ambergate {5 Alfreton {5} Ripley {4 Matlock {15} Derby {3 Langley Mill {3} Cromford {2 Shardlow { 2} Wirksworth {1 Mansfield { 1} Kirkby {1 Chesterfield{ 1} Pixton {1 Hulland { 1} South Normanton{1 Travellers { 16
